title: Homeowners/renters claims documentation
dataVerified: Claimant name, property address, loss details, estimate, adjuster report
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent claims (arson, inflated losses). Domain binding verifies adjuster/restoration company. Tamper-evident damage estimates. SIU fraud investigation. Multi-page: Adjuster reports, contractor estimates multi-page.
